Trade/Device Name(s): INSTANT-ViEw Drug of Abuse Urine (Cassette/Cup) Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for INSTANT-ViEw Drug of Abuse Urine (Cassette/Cup) Test for qualitative detection of morphine/opiate and oxycodone in urine using lateral flow immunoassay
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for home use to detect potential abuse of morphine/opiate and oxycodone in urine; preliminary screening only, requiring confirmatory alternate method for positive results
